socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Mean total annual cost per patient (reference year 2012), including direct, indirect and patient-incurred costs
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Social/economic costs and health-related quality of life of mucopolysaccharidosis patients and their caregivers in Europe

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Total cost of lysosomal storage disorders per patient-year, including direct SHS costs, indirect costs, and direct patient costs
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Humanistic, Economic, and Social Impact of Lysosomal Storage Disorders in Spain (ISPOR Europe 2024 Poster)

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Estimated annual out-of-pocket expenses (e.g., vitamins, physiotherapies) based on reported €1,000/month
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: La dura lucha de 70 familias españolas para que sus hijos no mueran antes de cumplir los 20

socioeconomic_analysis.justification: The Burqol-RD multicountry European peer-reviewed study provides Spain-specific cost-of-illness data, supported by recent Spanish conference data, but no Spain-only cost-of-illness study for MPS III was identified.
